alert.note: Alert for West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 6:46AM MST until February 07 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. * WHERE...West Central Highlands and West Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greater snowfall amounts are expected east of the Continental Divide.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains
